casebody.data:
PARAMOUNT RX, INC.
v.
Robert E. DUGGAN and Agelity, Inc. No. 376A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 21, 2015. Christopher Jones, Raleigh, for Paramount Rx, Inc. Leslie C. Packer, Raleigh, for Duggan, Robert E., et al. James Michael Weiss, for Duggan, Robert E., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of December 2015 by Plaintiff to Stay the Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of December 2015."
